attributes.action: Make it compulsory for school students to learn the history of LGBT rights.
attributes.additional_details: People need to understand the importance of LGBT lives and why we get the rights that are given too us. Hate crimes such as homophobia needs to come to an end.
attributes.background: There is not enough education on LGBT history and why the community needs the justice they deserve. People need to understand why they cant use the f slur freely and what happened to gay men and women previously in time
